verses.roman:
"miśra, tumi putrera tattva kichui nā jāna
bhartsana-tāḍana kara,--putra kari' māna"

synonyms: miśra—my dear Jagannātha Miśra; tumi—you; putrera—of your son; tattva—truth; kichui—something; nā—do not; jāna—know; bhartsana—rebuking; tāḍana—chastisement; kara—you do; putra—son; kari'-making Him; māna—you regard.
translation: "My dear Miśra, you do not know anything about your son. You think Him your son, and therefore you rebuke and chastise Him."
